original_title: Lo ammazz√≤ come un cane... ma lui rideva ancora
overview: Barton's (Michael Forrest) family is massacred by outlaws. Vowing revenge, he sets out to hunt down the killers. Along the way he meets a mysterious, flute-playing gunslinger (Steven Tedd) who claims to know the identity of the killers and agrees to help bring them to justice. But he has a secret of his own.
title: Death Played the Flute
